segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, even if it means falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is barely holding him, and he doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
